name: Thrash Metal
description: Blistering tempos, palm-muted, technical riffing influenced by Speed Metal, aggressive drumming utilizing double-kick and skank beats, and diverse vocal styles ranging from harsh to clean techniques.

children.name: Crossover Thrash
children.description: Mixes the metallic instrumentation of Thrash Metal with the ethos and approach of Hardcore Punk.

children.name: Crossover Thrash
children.description: Mixes the metallic instrumentation of Thrash Metal with the ethos and approach of Hardcore Punk.

children.name: Technical Thrash Metal
children.description: Places great emphasis on complex songwriting and demanding instrumental parts.
